DOC.brief_summary: Endothelin-1 ( ET-1 ) link number condition include pulmonary arterial hypertension ( PAH ) . ET-1 act via 2 receptor , ETA ETB . The ET-1 receptor blocker bosentan sitaxsentan show beneficial patient PAH . Bosentan block ETA ETB receptor . Sitaxsentan selectively block ETA receptor . Theoretically , selective ETA blockade may associate great vasodilation clearance ET-1 leave ETB receptor unblock . This directly study human . We aim investigate endothelial ETB-mediated vascular response bosentan sitaxsentan use ETB selective agonist ( ET-3 ) . We hypothesise clinically relevant dos : - Bosentan show evidence ETB receptor blockade compare sitaxsentan placebo . - These effect confirm 2 functional marker ETB receptor antagonism : plasma ET-1 ( sensitive , necessarily clinically relevant marker ) , forearm vasodilator response ET-3 .
DOC.brief_title: Role Endothelin-A ( ETA ) Endothelin-B ( ETB ) Receptors Vasodilatory Response Endothelin-3 ( ET-3 )
DOC.criteria: Healthy men postmenopausal woman Age 1870 year BMI 1835 kg/m2 Are mentally legally incapacitate Have donate blood within last 4 week Have history past present drug alcohol abuse Have participate another clinical trial within 1 month Are consider high risk HIV Hepatitis B Are take routine medicine Are woman take hormone replacement therapy Have significant medical psychiatric illness
